column1: Baby Barnaby's////Got there around 10 on a Sunday morning and there was a wait list for indoor seating (which
column2: from the looks of it was pretty cramped)
column4: since the weather was so nice
column5: we found a spot on the patio which was first come
column6: first serve. Â Our server was great (his name on our receipt was "the man"
column7: which is telling of the chill/quasi-hippie atmosphere of Barnaby's)
